title: How Can Foxconn’s Exit Be A Fortunate Turn of Events in Disguise For India?
description: Taiwan’s Foxconn Technology has decided to end its partnership with India-focused resources conglomerate Vedanta to manufacture chips, dealing a blow to India’s ambitions of becoming a semiconductor manufacturing hub. The collaboration, valued at nearly $20 billion, aimed to establish a chip plant in Gujarat, the home state of Prime Minister Narendra Modi. Despite this setback, ... Read more

title: Polygon Price Prediction 2023-2032: Is MATIC Going Past $1 Soon?

title: UK Passes Bill to Recognize Crypto as Regulated Financial Activity, Deta Finance Complies with Regulations
description: In a significant development for the cryptocurrency industry, the United Kingdom has passed a bill that recognizes cryptocurrencies as regulated financial activities within the country. This move marks a major step forward in providing legal clarity and regulatory oversight for digital assets.  As the industry adapts to this new regulatory landscape, Deta Finance is at [...]

title: BlackRock ETF Pushing Bitcoin to ‘Inflection Point’ as US Entities Accumulate BTC: Glassnode
description:
A prominent analytics firm says BlackRock’s Bitcoin (BTC) spot exchange-traded fund (ETF) application is pushing US-based entities to accumulate the crypto king. Glassnode notes that the share of Bitcoin supply held and traded by US entities is witnessing a significant rise since BlackRock, the world’s largest investment firm with over $10 trillion in assets under […]
